title: BUSINESS ADMINISTRATION & MANAGEMENT
utme_requirements:
Five (5) SSC credit passes in English Language, not Literature in English and Mathematics and any three (3) subjects from the following:

Economics/Commerce,

Business Methods,

Principles of Accounts,

Literature in English

Geography

Office Practice

Biology/Agricultural Science,

Chemistry,

Physics,

History/Government

Typewriting

Shorthand
subjects: Mathematics and two (2) of Geography, Commerce, Government, Principles of Accounts and Economics.

title: ELECTRICAL/ELECTRONICS ENGINEERING TECHNOLOGY
utme_requirements:
Five (5) 'O' Level credit passes in Mathematics, Physics and Chemistry and any two (2) subjects from:

Biology/Agricultural Science

Technical Drawing,

Basic Electronics/Basic Electricity,

Auto Mechanics,

Metal Work,

Woodwork (for Civil Engineering Tech.),

Further Mathematics

English Language,

Geography,

Economics/Commerce.

For Marine Engineering and Industrial Safety & Environmental Engineering. 'O' Level pass in Biology is required.

At least 'O' Level credit pass in English Language is required.

title: NAUTICAL SCIENCE
utme_requirements:
Five (5) SSC credit passes in English Language is required.

Mathematics, Physics, Geography and two (2) others from

Chemistry,

Economics/Commerce,

Biology/Agricultural Science,

Woodwork,

Metalwork,

Foreign Language,

Technical Drawing,

Basic Electricity.

Plus five (5) SSC credit pass in English Language.
subjects: Any three (3) of Geography, Physics, Mathematics, Technical Drawing and Economics
